title: ET Defence Bulletin: Donald Trump's US moves UN to ban Pathankot mastermind Masood Azhar
text: Another news that may force US to impose sanctions on Pakistan's funding was a report by US think tank of South Asian experts. Budget 2017: NEW DELHI: Below is a list of the top defence stories of today. Hover over the image below and click on the icons to read the stories. The biggest defence development of the day came as a good sign for India as Donald Trump administration has moved to UN seeking ban on Pathankot attack mastermind and JeM chief Masood Azhar , while China has again strongly opposed the demand. Another news that may force US to impose sanctions on Pakistan's funding was a report by US think tank of South Asian experts. On the one side, India has shown its firmness for UNSC reform, while Pakistan has slammed India's move seeking permanent seat in the UNSC. Some other important dvelopments include US planning to increase its defence budget, Chinese media's report indirectly threatening India while supporting Pakistan. Check out the detailed coverage below:
